channel.title: HElp (reward: ++rep)
channel.description: ok the the shotscape source i accedenitly edited the run server.bat, if someone can post the orgianal runserver.bat i will give ++rep---ty ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ and for noobs that will tell me to download again i cant because it wont let you donnload the samething twice into the same file.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 08:45:45 PM[/size][hr]guh

item.title: HElp (reward: ++rep)
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

no need for creding me, its from server tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: HElp (reward: ++rep)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

rofl D2 porn noob

if you dont have pause the batch file will close and there will be no point in running the server :laughoutloud:

item.title: HElp (reward: ++rep)
item.dc:creator: @D27L7T D27L7T
item.description:
@D27L7T wrote:

Actually, it’s not. :rolleyes:

The pause only keeps the command window open after execution is complete. It’s pointless, since most people close their server by closing the command window and not by using the killServer.

Read full topic

item.title: HElp (reward: ++rep)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“D27L7T, post:2, topic:21110”] @echo off title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server [/quote]

it is supposed to be this:

[quote author=D27L7T link=topic=32085.msg378072#msg378072 date=1162281085]

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic
